title: Patch notes are impossible to read for me
body: It is almost impossible for me to use support page and to read patch notes because of the coloring. Usually when there is dark background with light text it causes me to get migraine like symptoms. I wish you would have an alternative background that is light with dark text... At least patch notes were readable before but now the new 7.22 have changed it.  I'm pretty sure I'm not the only one with the symptoms

replies.body: You should also be able to see the patch notes in the client itself by clicking that tab under the Play button, but I'll be sure to take that feedback over to the devs for ya!
